alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 8:54PM CDT until April 01 at 8:24PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam affecting Wilcox, Dallas and Monroe Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam. * WHEN...From late tonight to Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 68.0 feet, Millers Ferry Park begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 62.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 73.9 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 66.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
